items.sentence: Tom walked into the kitchen to get himself some coffee.
Have you ever read the story of the boy who cried wolf?
I asked Tom some questions and he answered all of them.
Can I talk to you about something that\'s bothering me?
His trip will keep him away from the office for a week.
Tom didn\'t seem to be interested in what was going on.
Tom didn\'t speak French as well as I thought he could.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary anything about what had happened.
Tom didn\'t thank Mary enough for all the work she did.
Do you really believe Tom would do something like that?
Do you really want to raise these children by yourself?
Do you remember how good Tom was at playing the guitar?
Tom doesn\'t like people who smoke in no smoking areas.
Tom has three daughters. All three of them are married.
How did you find out that Tom was the one who did that?
How do you balance being a mother, a wife and a lawyer?
I didn\'t know that you were such superstitious people.
Do you really think that I\'m going to let you do that?
I\'m worried about what\'ll happen if Tom doesn\'t win.
Tom hasn\'t been doing what he\'s supposed to be doing.
